entry.title: 36 pcs 2” Cream Real Touch 3D Artificial DIY Foam Rose Flower Head
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5120
Type: Craft Flowers
Price: 5.99 - 53.91 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: High Quality Foam
Color: Cream
Quantity: 36 Flowers/Order
Flower Type: Semi-Bloomed Rose
Rose Diameter: 2"
Rose Height: 1"
Features: Real Touch, Floating
Perfect for making bouquets, centerpieces, kissing balls, boutonnieres, cake flowers, gift decoration.
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Soft, smooth texture and delicate life-like blossom’s appearance make these foam roses a perfect DIY floral accent for your home, party, wedding, or event’s decoration. These realistic looking foam roses provide you much superior and refined version of artificial flowers. Made from high quality Styrofoam, these faux blossoms will continue having a perfect shape, displaying everlasting bloom forever. Use these darlings to add a refreshing touch of blooming beauty to your backdrops, table decoration, vases, candle holders, aisle path, arches, and favors. Make stunning bouquets, corsages, flower arrangements, favor decorations, centerpiece decorations, and other craft creations displaying undying festive radiance.


Additional Information:

  • Material: High Quality Foam
  • Rose Diameter: 2"
  • Rose Height: 1"
  • Quantity: 36 Flowers / Order
  • Flower Type: Semi-Bloomed Rose
  • Features: Real Touch, Floating 
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

  • Can only print regular english alphabet, numbers, and Symbols,  ( ) ? ! : $ " , @ / - &
  • Please be informed that letters with accent on them (such as: á, é, í, ó, ú, ñ, ü) will be converted to regular English alphabet.
  • We don’t do Custom Logos.

[Information]

It’s that time of year you have been awaiting desperately for!  It’s YOUR day, YOUR Celebration, and YOUR moment! Make it YOURS! Make it personalized with the reflection of your hearty feelings and emotions exhibited in simple little details of your big day.

From table napkins and match boxes to wedding favors and favor boxes, everything should sing your heart song. Shaped like an adorable Vase shaped, this cute favor box will tempt your guests way more than the treats that you pack in it. Perfect for storing favors in a sweet stylish way for weddings, birthdays, showers, engagements, Christmas, and other jubilant events.

Additional Information:

  • Custom printed 2" W x 3" H Stylish Vase Favor Boxes
  • Very popular as favor box to store some sweet treats or other nice surprises.
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Baby Shower, Gift Boxes, Favor Boxes, Candy Boxes

Text Imprint Guideline:

Caps takes up 1.5 character spaces.

Maximum character limits does include spaces, please do not go over the maximum character limits. If it will require revisions, it will delay production of your order. Please count the number of characters yourself to avoid delays. Hot foil printing, not laser/machine engraved.

    * We will print EXACTLY as you enter.
    * Exception: if all CAPS due to CAPS taking 1.5 spacing, if and only if we cannot fit the entire line in CAPS,
       we will change to lower case letters.
    * We will NOT check for spelling errors, mistypes, or print color combinations.
    * Please make sure to review the order carefully prior to order confirmation.  

* Can only print regular english alphabet, numbers, and the following symbols,  ( ) ? ! : $ " , @ / - &

* Please be informed that letters with accent on them (such as: á, é, í, ó, ú, ñ, ü) will be converted to regular English alphabet.

* If it's not listed here, then unfortunately, we are unable to print it. Not able to do foreign characters, symbols, accents. Sorry, not able to do custom logos.

PRODUCTION TIME:

This is the time required for production of your personalized item BEFORE shipping, and does not include actual transit time. Please allow yourself enough time for the additional production time you've chosen.

Flaunt your festive glee and swish taste with these cute square favor boxes bearing an impeccable glossy outer finish. Choose from the huge range of exciting colors the hue of your choice to create an exotic display at your upcoming special event. Fill these delicate boxes with the candies and chocolate of your choice, small sized goodies, cake slices, and even petite jewelry items to entice your treasured guests. Decorate candy boxes with ribbons, trims, laces, flowers, bows, or pearl strings and stickers to create beautiful favors for weddings, birthdays, showers, trade shows, corporate events, tea parties, holiday events, and other festive occasions.

[Information]

Cherish the parental bliss with a dash of sparkle and a whole lot of BLING! Welcome this precious blessing in your life by celebrating and rejoicing these memorable moments, surround yourself with sweet little reminders of this delightful phase of life that you are about to embark on. Your little baby will soon be in your cradle; loved, soothed, and fed by you. Our crystal clear acrylic baby milk feeder bottles will reflect the festive sheen of your parental glee. Perfect to adorn your baby shower favors, birthday favors, shower decorations, invites and more in the most elegant manner, these acrylic baby feeder bottles will make your guests€™ hearts brim with love and sweetness for your little one. Their multi-faceted surface will reflect light and colors to all the directions, creating a surreal display of illuminated ecstasy. Hang these from Manzanita tree branches, balloons, lanterns, foil alphabets and numbers, centerpieces, vases, backdrop stands, and arches, or simply scatter on the tables to exude heaps of merry radiance all around displaying your successful elevation to the next level of a content life!

  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
